subject: Baseball
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: While his peers and fans praised Ryan Freel’s headfirst approach throughout an eight-year career in the major leagues, the person closest to him became tormented by it.
snippet: While his peers and fans praised Ryan Freel’s headfirst approach throughout an eight-year career in the major leagues, the person closest to him became tormented by it.
